title: Hoagy Carmichael
summary: Hoagland Howard Carmichael (November 22, 1899 â€“ December 27, 1981) was an American songwriter, musician, actor, singer, and attorney. Carmichael was one of the most successful Tin Pan Alley songwriters of the 1930s, and was among the first singer-songwriters in the age of mass media to utilize new communication technologies such as television, electronic microphones, and sound recordings.
